apis.name: Notes API
apis.description: This includes system notes, which are notes about changes to the object (for example, when an assignee changes, GitLab posts a system note).

apis.name: Resource events
apis.description: Some system notes are not part of this API, but are recorded as separate events:

apis.name: Rate limits
apis.description: To help avoid abuse, you can limit your users to a specific number of Create request per minute. See Notes rate limits.

apis.name: List project issue notes
apis.description: Gets a list of all notes for a single issue.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

attributes.name: issue_iid
attributes.description: The IID of an issue

attributes.name: sort
attributes.description: Return issue notes sorted in asc or desc order. Default is desc

attributes.name: order_by
attributes.description: Return issue notes ordered by created_at or updated_at fields. Default is created_at

attributes.name: id

attributes.name: issue_iid
